Name: Student Solutions Manual Volume 2 for Essential University Physics

ReviewList.Text: This is a good study tool, wish it incorporated more than just the odd numbers but it is what it is; the content that is in the manual is helpful as well as descriptive.

I always buy the student solutions manual for every math and science class that I take.  This solutions manual in particular is one of the best that I have ever seen.  It has extremely thorough, step-by-step solutions to every odd-numbered problem presented in the textbook.  I can't imagine taking a Physics class without it's accompanying solutions manual!  This is definitely a MUST HAVE.
The book arrived very fast and was in very good condition for a used book. I am very satisfied with this purchase.
